nodes.name: Text Classifier

categories.description: =Emails requesting help, troubleshooting, or guidance for a product or service. Usually describe issues like login errors, bugs, or malfunctioning features. Common keywords: error, issue, problem, help, access, support, fix, reset, troubleshoot.

Emails about payments, invoices, refunds, or subscriptions. The sender wants to confirm, dispute, or update financial details. Common keywords: invoice, payment, refund, billing, charge, subscription, renewal, receipt.
Urgent or time-sensitive emails about critical issues or outages requiring immediate attention. Common keywords: urgent, ASAP, critical, outage, down, immediate, emergency, escalation.

Marketing or sales-focused emails promoting offers, discounts, or new products. Tone is upbeat and persuasive. Common keywords: sale, offer, discount, promotion, new feature, upgrade, limited time, exclusive.

Emails that do not clearly fit Customer Support, Finance/Billing, High Priority, or Promotion. Includes neutral or informational messages such as product announcements without offers, general updates, newsletters without calls to action, internal or FYI communications, and messages where intent is unclear or ambiguous. Use this category only when no other category confidently applies.

nodes.name: Customer Support Agent

options.systemMessage:
=You are Nate's AI Assistant ‚Äî an expert, friendly, and professional customer support representative for **AI Automation Society**.

Your role:
- Respond clearly, concisely, and helpfully to member questions.
- Always maintain a warm and approachable tone that reflects Nate Herk‚Äôs brand and community values.
- Provide accurate information about AI Automation Society, its programs, challenges, and community rules.
- If you do **not** know the answer or the query requires Nate‚Äôs direct input, politely tell the user to reach out to **nateherk88@gmail.com**.

Always sign off every message with:
‚Äì Nate‚Äôs AI Assistant

nodes.name: Send a message

parameters.subject: =New Billing Email: {{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.from.value[0].name }}
parameters.message:
=Hey Billing team!

We received a new billing inquiry at {{ $now.format('yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm a') }}.

It is from {{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.from.value[0].name }} you can email them at {{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.from.value[0].address }}.

This is the subject of their email: {{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.subject }}

Cheers!

nodes.name: Mr. Doomsday

options.systemMessage:
=You are Mr. Doomsday ‚Äî an expert but brutally honest and rude customer support representative for **AI Automation Society**.

Your role:
- Respond with accurate information, but do so in a sarcastic, blunt, and unapologetically rude tone.
- Never sugarcoat answers. If someone asks something obvious, make it clear they should‚Äôve known better.
- Keep responses short, direct, and dripping with attitude ‚Äî but still correct.
- If you don‚Äôt know the answer or it requires Nate‚Äôs direct input, tell the user (in your signature rude style) to contact **nateherk88@gmail.com**.

Always sign off every message with:
‚Äì Mr. Doomsday

[

"subject": "Domains from just $0.98 in our New Year Sale",
"body": "Namecheap Save big on everything you need to bring your idea to life online in \n2026!  Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá \nÕè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè \n‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå \n‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá \nÕè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè \n‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå \n‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá Õè ‚Äå ‚Äá \n‚Ä¶",
"expected_label": "Promotion",
"expected_confidence_min": 0.99,
"actual_label": null,
"model": "chatgpt-5.2"
},
{
"unique_id": "email-002",
"subject": "Babylon, this could be your vibe",
"body": "To view this content open the following URL in your browser: [https://www.pinterest.com/email/click/?user_id=NzM1NjM1MDU3NzkxOTIwNzYx&od=dD04NzJkOTcxNTJhNDg0NjVmOTg2OWQxMWE5YzQ3YmEyNiZjPUhPTUVGRUVEX0RJR0VTVF9QSU5TJnM9ODcyZDk3MTUyYTQ4NDY1Zjk4NjlkMTFhOWM0N2JhMjYmbj0zMDcyNDg2NWE5ODU0ODcyODgxMjAxM2Y1YjcwYmUwOA%3D%3D&target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pinterest.com%2Fsecure%2Fautologin%2F%3Fuser_id%3DNzM1NjM1MDU3NzkxOTIwNzYx%26od%3DDWyTOazqTiQRsGdMQRzBGLMqC5fyy8tyzd07e0cf5eqPkVMsBjHfXmPNi4W5LT5HjB5sCj%252B7zkM8BEZKkyY%252FFb9FLvrPK6JWXBsnWqgpKgKoJOBDUcvy5SjgipH5nrr4VsgQ0DEU9P19BFzlj%252Byl%252FQ%253D%253D%26next%3D%252F%253Futm_campaign%253Dhfdigestpins%2526e_t%253D872d97152a48465f9869d11a9c47ba26%2526e_t_s%253Dcta%2526utm_source%253D31%2526utm_medium%253D2004](https://www.pinterest.com/email/click/?user_id=NzM1NjM1MDU3NzkxOTIwNzYx&od=dD04NzJkOTcxNTJhNDg0NjVmOTg2OWQxMWE5YzQ3YmEyNiZjPUhPTUVGRUVEX0RJR0VTVF9QSU5TJnM9ODcyZDk3MTUyYTQ4NDY1Zjk4NjlkMTFhOWM0N2JhMjYmbj0zMDcyNDg2NWE5ODU0ODcyODgxMjAxM2Y1YjcwYmUwOA%3D%3D&target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pinterest.com%2Fsecure%2Fautologin%2F%3Fuser_id%3DNzM1NjM1MDU3NzkxOTIwNzYx%26od%3DDWyTOazqTiQRsGdMQRzBGLMqC5fyy8tyzd07e0cf5eqPkVMsBjHfXmPNi4W5LT5HjB5sCj%252B7zkM8BEZKkyY%252FFb9FLvrPK6JWXBsnWqgpKgKoJOBDUcvy5SjgipH5nrr4VsgQ0DEU9P19BFzlj%252Byl%252FQ%253D%253D%26next%3D%252F%253Futm_campaign%253Dhfdigestpins%2526e_t%253D872d97152a48465f9869d11a9c47ba26%2526e_t_s%253Dcta%2526utm_source%253D31%2526utm_medium%253D2004)",
"expected_label": "Promotion",
"expected_confidence_min": 0.96,
"actual_label": null,
"model": "chatgpt-5.2"
},
{
"unique_id": "email-003",
"subject": "Start 2026 strong. Save on it all: $50/yr.",
"body": "Make the most of the new year with unlimited access to the complete Times experience: News, Games, Cooking, Wirecutter, The Athletic and more.\n\n-- The New York Times --\n\nReady to reset? We've got you covered.",
"expected_label": "Promotion",
"expected_confidence_min": 0.97,
"actual_label": null,
"model": "chatgpt-5.2"
},
{
"unique_id": "email-004",
"subject": "Save Over $50 on last-minute stays for MLK weekend",
"body": "Save over $50 on last-minute stays. Make the most of the long weekend with a last-minute ski escape. Find cabins, condos, and chalets close to the lifts.",

"expected_confidence_min": 0.98,
"actual_label": null,
"model": "chatgpt-5.2"
},
{
"unique_id": "email-005",
"subject": "‚è∞ 1 day left! | Pro audio deals from $29 ‚è∞",

"expected_label": "Promotion",
"expected_confidence_min": 0.99,
"actual_label": null,

},
{

"subject": "üé•CES 2026 Live: Join xTool‚Äôs Innovation Hub Tour",
"body": "To view the graphic version (HTML) of this e-mail, click on the following link or copy it into your browser.",
"expected_label": "Promotion",
"expected_confidence_min": 0.95,

"model": "chatgpt-5.2"
},

"expected_label": "Promotion",

},

"expected_confidence_min": 0.99,

},

;
